Source code for glimg.math

import math as m
import numpy as np

#------------------- triangle -------------------#

[docs]def angle(rad):
    return rad/np.pi*180.



[docs]def rad(angle):
    return angle/180.*np.pi



[docs]def cos(angle):
    rad = rad(angle)
    return m.cos(rad)



[docs]def sin(angle):
    rad = rad(angle)
    return m.sin(rad)



[docs]def tan(angle):
    rad = rad(angle)
    return m.tan(rad)



[docs]def acos(val):
    rad = m.acos(val)
    return angle(rad)



[docs]def asin(val):
    rad = m.asin(val)
    return angle(rad)



[docs]def atan(val):
    rad = m.atan(val)
    return angle(rad)
